title: Style Guide
text: Use @import @importFrom discouraged, instead using :: functions defined R/. exception infix functions (%name%), always imported, using roxygen @importFrom. Within R Notebooks, use library() encouraged readability.

text: rdev package implements styler using styler defaults, permanent caching enabled (options(styler.cache_root = "styler-perm")). style_all() function applies tidyverse style R files (R, Rprofile, Rmd, Rnw) package directory structure.

title: Style Guide
text: rdev uses opinionated lintr configuration (.lintr): settings deliberately chosen meet specific goals:
code: linters: linters_with_tags(     tags = NULL,     extraction_operator_linter = NULL,     implicit_integer_linter = NULL,     line_length_linter(100),     missing_package_linter = NULL,     namespace_linter = NULL,     nonportable_path_linter = NULL,     paste_linter(allow_file_path = "always"),     todo_comment_linter = NULL,     undesirable_function_linter(       within(all_undesirable_functions, rm(ifelse, library, require, structure))     ),     undesirable_operator_linter(all_undesirable_operators),     unnecessary_concatenation_linter(allow_single_expression = FALSE),     unused_import_linter(       except_packages = c("bit64", "data.table", "tidyverse", pkgload::pkg_name("."))     )   )
